title: Ocean Week, Map Bonus
body:
>Taken from ocean week main information page.
 How can you contribute?
> You contribute 1 point when you win a game of Blind Pick, Team Builder or Twisted Treeline when it’s available with an Ocean Week champion!
> Ranked solo/duo, ranked teams, ARAM, CO Op versus AI and custom games do not count towards Ocean Week.


Today's Map bonus is Howling Abyss.
We cant use Howling abyss for Blind Pick or Team Builder (which in it self is not even available in OCE)
How are we suppose to utilize the map bonus if the map itself does not count?

replies.body:
You are looking a previous years Ocean Week site (2015, I think!) Can you let me know how you got to that page so we can help anyone else who may stumble upon it?

Check out this page: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017

The currently active map bonus (until midnight tonight) is Howling Abyss - which means that the ARAM mode will provide double points. This will change at midnight tonight to be Twisted Treeline instead.
ty and your cute face, I was also confuse.

Which ocean week page are you looking at? ARAM definitely contributes points, so does ranked.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017

Down the bottom under Game Mode Bonuses it just lists co-op vs AI and custom as the two that won't give points :)

ARAM does have a blind pick; **Random Blind Pick**

So, you just gotta play ARAM, bro :)
